front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks-Media Access Control (MAC) Security
front.abstract: How all or part of a network can be secured transparently to peer protocol entities that use the MAC Service provided by IEEE 802Â® LANs to communicate is specified in this standard. MAC security (MACsec) provides connectionless user data confidentiality, frame data integrity, and data origin authenticity.(The PDF of this standard is available at no cost to you compliments of the IEEE GET program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page).
